Name: Techno Boy
About the game: Techno Boy is an incredibly cool, old-school platformer in which you have to tear Techno guy out of the paws of mad scientists and bring him back by all means to his native planet. Challenge yourself through the ominous tests and break through the impenetrable forest of hands, the ocean teeming with hungry piranhas, the legion of ghosts and do not get into the maze set by bloody spiders. Pass these 60 levels full of violence, and you will cry with happiness. Your lightning fast actions are half the battle!
